channel.title: Rhel on Everyday Linux
channel.description: Recent content in Rhel on Everyday Linux

item.title: Performance and Benchmarking
item.description: Performance and Benchmarking Are there any benchmarking and performance testing tools available in Red Hat Enterprise Linux?

item.title: Java on RHEL / Centos / Fedora
item.description: Java on RHEL / Centos / Fedora $ ls -lah /usr/lib/jvm total 20K drwxr-xr-x. 5 root root 4.0K Jul 30 09:56 . dr-xr-xr-x. 51 root root 4.0K Jul 20 12:02 .. lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 26 Jul 30 09:56 java -> /etc/alternatives/java_sdk lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 32 Jul 30 09:56 java-1.8.0 -> /etc/alternatives/java_sdk_1.8.0 lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 40 Jul 30 09:56 java-1.8.0-openjdk -> /etc/alternatives/java_sdk_1.8.0_openjdk drwxr-xr-x. 3 root root 4.0K Mar 29 10:21 java-1.

item.title: Attach a Specific Subscription Pool to a RHEL Machine
item.description: Attach a Specific Subscription Pool to a RHEL Machine subscription-manager list --all --available --matches="OpenShift Container Platform" | awk '/Pool ID/ {print $3}' | head -1 subscription-manager attach --pool=$(subscription-manager list --all --available --matches="OpenShift Container Platform" | awk '/Pool ID/ {print $3}' | head -1)
